item.title: 【UPSCALED】Ludovico Einaudi - Walk [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM 24-bit 48 kHz]
item.description:
Genre: Classical
Style: Modern
Year: 2013
Video Source: Vimeo
Audio Source: Qobuz

”Nuvole Bianche” is a piano solo by Italian pianist and composer Ludovico Einaudi, released in 2013 on Einaudi’s album In a Time Lapse.

Ludovico Maria Enrico Einaudi, born 23 November 1955, is trained at the Conservatorio Verdi in Milan and began his career as a classical composer, later incorporating other styles and genres such as pop, rock, folk, and world music. He is the one of the world’s leading contemporary classical artists; creating some of the genre’s defining works such as ‘Experience’, ‘Nuvole Bianche’, ‘Una Mattina’, and releasing albums including ‘In a Time Lapse’, ‘Una Mattina’ and ‘Divenire’.
Einaudi has composed the scores for a number of films and television productions, including This Is England, The Intouchables, I'm Still Here, the TV miniseries Doctor Zhivago, and Acquario (1996), for which he won the Grolla d'oro. His music was used as the score for the Golden Globe and Academy Award-winning films Nomadland and The Father.

The music video is produced by Wilde Wood Films and was shot during the recording of Einaudi's album 'In a Time Lapse'.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz HiRes 24-bit 48 kHz), synced with Adobe Audition.
